content.readme:
# Comic Generator

This is a simple web application that allows users to generate comics based on a text description.

## Features

- Input field for text description (English or German)
- Sends description to a configurable webhook for image generation
- Displays a countdown timer
- Shows a history of generated images with links to download
- Clicking a history link loads the corresponding prompt
- Submit button is disabled for 5 seconds after each submission
- Mobile-optimized and centered layout

## Setup

1. Clone the repository.
2. Open the `index.html` file in your web browser.

## Webhook

The application sends a POST request to the configured webhook URL with a JSON body in the following format:

```json
{
    "description": "Your text description here"
}
```

The webhook is expected to respond with a JSON object containing a `download_url` property:

```json
{
    "message": "Your comic was successfully generated!",
    "download_url": "https://example.com/path/to/your/comic.png"
}
```

Replace `https://hook.eu1.make.com/h4153k67va517axorsb91ks10zarqc4v` in `script.js` with your actual webhook URL.

## Files

- `index.html`: The main HTML file.
- `styles.css`: Contains the CSS for styling the website.
- `script.js`: Contains the JavaScript for the website's functionality.
- `README.md`: This file.

analysis.description: ComicGenerator is a lightweight, mobile-optimized web app that instantly turns text descriptions into downloadable comics via any AI image webhook. Perfect for creators, marketers, and educators needing quick visual storytelling without design skills.

valueProposition: Zero-setup comic creation from simple text prompts in English or German
Seamless integration with existing AI image APIs via configurable webhook
User-friendly history tracking, download links, and mobile-optimized UI
